title: 关于

content:
关于我自己

  1. 我是一位南京的程序员,这里记录着我的填坑之路.
  2. 我喜欢运动,喜欢篮球,马刺是我喜爱的球队,小石匠的故事也将会是我的故事

小石匠的故事

“When nothing seems to help, I go and look at a stonecutter hammering away this
rock perhaps a hundred times with out as much as a crack showing in it. Yet at
the hundred and first blow it will split in two, and I know it was not that blow
that did it but all that had gonc bcfore.”
. Jacob Riis
toc:
1. 关于我自己
  2. 小石匠的故事
